full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUBS THABS MDOR BSDUS RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR DU BYA BA'I TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUBS 'DI NYID, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDZAD PA'I SGRUBS KYI MI GSAL BA RNAMS 'DIR GANG GSUNG LTAR NGAG 'DON 'BA' ZHIG GO BDE BAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI GROGS MCHOG DAM PA AIR KHE DAR KHAN GNYER BA'I KHA 'DON DU, GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I DZA YA PAntI TA CHEN PO'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS RJE NYID GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING BSGYUR BA'O, 'DIS KYANG @023B RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RANG LUGS PHYOGS TU KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
